DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the feasibility of using a mobile health intervention to improve adherence to asthma medication among adolescents in an urban clinic setting. The intervention consists of an inhaler sensor strap to monitor asthma inhaler use and a mobile phone application to remind and incentivize patients to use their medication. This study will assess the feasibility and acceptability of this intervention to patients.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Trial of a Mobile Adherence Tool for Adolescents With Asthma
DOC.criteria: Age 1119 Asthma diagnosis Currently on a daily controller medication for Asthma Englishspeaking Pregnant Foster Care Emancipated minor
